content: pattern 034 the vee beanie adult one size fits most pattern and images are copyright protected and the sole property of simply made by erin the written pattern is for personal use only please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or images feel free to do what you like with the finished product but please credit me as the designer you may copy and paste the following information to your product pattern designed by simply made by erin www simplymadebyerin com www facebook com/simplymadebyerin www instagram com/simplymadebyerin skill level easy abbreviations standard american crochet terms materials chain s chain/chains approximately 95 yards size 5 bulky yarn 3 5oz /100g slip_stitch - slip_stitch 127yd/116m single_crochet - single_crochet i prefer lion brand lion s pride woolspun can be double_crochet - double_crochet purchased from michaels results will vary depending on st s - stitch/stitches yarn used round s - round/rounds k10 5/6 5mm crochet hook or size to meet gauge blo - back loop only stitch markers skip - skip tapestry needle v-st v_stitch flexible measuring tape button needle & coordinating thread button shown is about 35mm gauge working in the round first 3 rounds in pattern = 4 ¼ inches with k hook please be sure to check your gauge before starting as gauge can vary greatly from person to person and depending on the yarn used adjusting to meet gauge if your gauge doesn t match chances are your project will turn out smaller or larger than the size intended do not get discouraged many people crochet with different tensions even when using the same yarn or hook size suggested there are many adjustments that can be made to resolve this if you continue to have problems after trying the tips below please contact me i am more than happy to make adjustments and offer other suggestions to make the pattern work for you my email address is simplymadebyerin@gmail com 1 if the item is too small try going up a hook size or two if it s too big go down a hook size or two 2 when available try working the pattern instructions for the next size up or down 3 add or subtract increase or decrease row/rounds this can be tricky on certain patterns therefore i only suggest doing this if you are comfortable in making these adjustments on your own doing this may interfere with the remainder of the pattern and change the stitch count throughout size adult one size fits most - fits head circumference 21-23 inches sizes are approximate based on the average for each age when available please use head measurements rather than age as children and adult heads tend to vary quite a bit special stitches no-space double_crochet v_stitch 1 working in a row or round *work 2 double_crochet in same st v created skip next st* repeat from * to * around/across 2 on the remaining row/rounds *work 2 double_crochet in the space between the two double_crochet that create the
